description: Vectors, linear independence, scalar product. Matrices, simultaneous equations, determinants, vector product, eigenvalues, eigenvectors, applications. Equation of straight line & plane. Extreme value theorem, maxima & minima. Sequences, series, Taylor series, L'Hopital's rules. Techniques of integration, numerical methods, volumes of revolution.
restricted:
GCSc, GCEdSt, GDipEdSt, MEdSt. 
Permission from the Head of School is required to enrol in this course.
